title: 'Blood was gushing from my face but I wasn't going to give up'
description: Laura Kenny says she was determined not to give up after crashing and cutting her face during the omnium scratch race at the Track Cycling World Championships.

title: Why should I care if share prices fall?
description: Changes in the FTSE 100 and other indexes are not just for City types, they can affect our lives.

title: Teen girl beats boys to 'make history' as state champion
description: Heaven Fitch overcame male wrestlers to become North Carolina's first girl to win a secondary school title.

title: Facemasks on catwalk at Fashion Week

title: Labour leadership: Can Jeremy Corbyn secure a legacy?
description: Allies of the Labour leader are worried about how the contest to replace him is shaping up, writes Iain Watson.

title: Prince Harry meets Jon Bon Jovi at Abbey Road Studios

title: Former Barclays executives cleared of fraud charges
description: Roger Jenkins, Tom Kalaris and Richard Boath are found not guilty on all charges in under six hours.

description: Turkey hits Syrian government targets in response and the EU warns of a major conflict developing.

title: Coronavirus: Nigeria confirms first case in sub-Saharan Africa

title: IAG and EasyJet warn of coronavirus bookings hit

title: Sun Yang: Eight-year ban for Chinese Olympic champion
description: China's three-time Olympic champion swimmer Sun Yang is banned from competing for eight years for missing a doping test in September 2018.

description: Greta Thunberg addresses the Bristol Youth Strike 4 Climate event before a march through the city.

title: Packham 'outraged' by Cambridge University bird netting

title: East Yorkshire flooding worsens as residents evacuated from homes
description: Water is pouring off fields which are unable to hold it from the swollen River Aire in East Yorkshire.

title: Coronavirus: Plague Inc. game banned in China
description: Plague Inc. puts users in control of a disease which they must develop into a global pandemic.

title: BBC's Sam Poling kept endometriosis private to hide 'weakness'

title: Why has the latest UK storm been named 'Jorge'?

title: Downfall: BP refinery worker sacked over Hitler parody wins job back

title: Telescopes detect 'biggest explosion since Big Bang'
